doc.title: Behind the Player: Mike Inez
doc.plot: GrammyÂ® Award winning bassist Mike Inez has played for Alice In Chains, Ozzy Osbourne, Heart, Black Label Society and Slash's Snakepit. Inez gives an intimate behind-the scenes look at his life as a professional musician - including rare photos and video footage. Inez then gives in-depth bass lessons for how to play "A Little Bitter" and "Again" by Alice In Chains and jams the tracks with The Cult's drummer John Tempesta.
